>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/organizations/{organizationId}/invites"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieve all invite links for an organization. Only organization admins can view invite links.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"organizationId","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Organization ID"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
